Text:
So, this alarmist material is from 7 years ago and now the crazies are panicking to try to cover their butts as they attempt to explain why temps have not raised as predicted/modeled.

What ever.

(Reuters) - Scientists are struggling to explain a slowdown in climate change that has exposed gaps in their understanding and defies a rise in global greenhouse gas emissions.

The Earth is self repairing, we cannot change it no matter what.  

The Earth always has cycles and the cycles resit just like the Free Market in unregulated by Big Government.
